type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.cache.ResolutionControl
type.description:
Command methods for controlling dependency resolution via the DSL.
param: The type of the request object for this resolution
param: The type of the result of this resolution

method.name: getRequest
method.description:
Returns the query object that was requested in this resolution.

returns:the request object

method.name: refresh
method.description: States that any cached value should be ignored, forcing a fresh resolve.

method.name: getCachedResult
method.description:
Returns the cached result file or null if the result has not been cached.

returns:the cached result

method.name: cacheFor
method.description:
States that the cached value should be used if it is no older than the specified duration.
param:value The number of units
param:units The time units

method.name: useCachedResult
method.description: States that the cached value should be used regardless of age. If not cachedResult is available, resolution should fail.

property.name: request
property.description:
Returns the query object that was requested in this resolution.

returns:the request object

property.name: cachedResult
property.description:
Returns the cached result file or null if the result has not been cached.

returns:the cached result
